maths.title: Steps to the Stars
maths.question: Add up the years of each spaceflight milestone (AD, 1â€“4 digits). Closest total wins.
maths.intro: From the first human in orbit to the newest rover on Mars.

events.prompt: Yuri Gagarin orbits Earth aboard Vostok 1.
Apollo 11 lands the first humans on the Moon.
Voyager 1 launches toward the outer planets and beyond.
Zarya, the first module of the International Space Station, reaches orbit.
NASA's Perseverance rover touches down in Jezero Crater on Mars.

clues: Voyager 1 launch toward the outer planets.
reveals: Voyager 1 launch toward the outer planets.
